content: प्रतिसृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go back, return. {@--2@} To go towards, rush upon, attack, assail; दैत्यः प्रत्यसरद्देवं मत्तो मत्तमिव द्विपं <ls>Hariv.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To push backwards, replace; कनकवलयं स्रस्तं स्रस्तं मया प्रतिसार्यते <ls>Ś. 3. 13.</ls> {@--2@} To repel, drive away or back
